typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Date as string,
		Base_Currency as string,
		Target_Currency as string,
		EOM_Rate as string,
		Average_Mon_Rate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
ConvertStringToStagingDataType select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		{Base Currency},
		{Target Currency} = ConvertStringToStagingDataType@{Target Currency},
		EOM_Rate,
		Average_Mon_Rate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Date = toTimestamp(Date, 'dd/MM/yyyy'),
		{Base Currency} = toDecimal({Base Currency}, 18, 4),
		{Target Currency} = toDecimal({Target Currency},18,4)) ~> ConvertStringToStagingDataType
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		Forex_Date as timestamp,
		Base_Currency as string,
		Target_Curency as string,
		EOM_Rate as decimal(18,4),
		Avg_Mon_Rate as decimal(18,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
